name: Fokusli
description:
Fokusli, is a game where you can challenge yourself and focus on what you see on the screen! It improves concentration and increases the focus level. Moreover, it depends on user reaction within short time.

It has three levels: colors, numbers and grid. In the colors level, the user needs to tab on the right color, according to the color name that is written on the screen. In the numbers game, the user has to type the number he/she sees on the screen. Grid game the user needs to tab on the color that is similar to the square color in the middle of the grid you see on the screen.
